attributes.action: create and introduce a local concessionary bus card for young people in the town of Walsall, West Midlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This concessionary bus card will reduce bus fares in Walsall to a standard rate for all young people under 18 in full time education. The bus concession card will apply at off peak times allowing them to travel to school/college and anywhere in Walsall for a standard reduced price.
